describeFeatureType

public void describeFeatureType(java.lang.String featureType,
                                java.lang.String nameSpace,
                                org.gvsig.remoteClient.wms.ICancellable cancel)
                         throws org.gvsig.remoteClient.wfs.exceptions.WFSException
Description copied from interface: WFSDriver
Obtiene la informacion asociada a una feature particular. Esta información puede ser un conjunto de campos o un esquema que los contiene. No devuleve nada. Simplemente actualiza la lista de features.

Specified by:

Parameters:

connect

public boolean connect(boolean override,
                       org.gvsig.remoteClient.wms.ICancellable cancel)
                throws java.io.IOException,
                       com.hardcode.gdbms.engine.data.driver.DriverException
Establishes the connection to the WfS server. Connecting to a WFS is an abstraction.

Actually, it sends a GetCapabilities request to read the necessary data for building further DescribeFeatureType requests.

Throws:
IOException, - DriverException.
java.io.IOException
com.hardcode.gdbms.engine.data.driver.DriverException
